duties_responsibilities.duty: Contact landowners to negotiate the acquisition of real property rights and settlements of claims.
Analyze property appraisals and make recommendations to the client using real estate practices, legal concepts, and governmental standards.
Represent the client in negotiations with property owners and attorneys, and recommend further actions based on the outcome.
Estimate potential damages in advance of construction and gather information on damages during construction.
Prepare lawsuit packages for condemnation proceedings and serve as an expert witness if necessary.
Maintain a healthy work environment and professional interactions with office staff, the client, and landowners.

education_certification.credential: Associate degree or two years of college and two plus years of Right of Way experience, or equivalent combination of education and experience.
